name: Cactus Seeking Hug
description:
A cactus searches for someone to hug in a light-hearted journey across the desert.

Made in 24 hours for GXDev 2015. Developed using Unity, Photoshop, TexturePacker, and Flash.

Credits
Bryon Delima - Art/Animation
Andrew Gaubatz - Programming
Dan McAlister - Concept/Audio
Megan Prazenica - Art/Animation
Andrew Yoon - Scenario
